trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a collection of <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> objects that represent the selected dates in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
This class cannot be inherited.

Use this class to programmatically manage a collection of <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the selected dates in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
This class is commonly used to add or remove dates from the collection.
This collection stores only whole dates.
The time portion of each <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> is removed.
The dates are stored in ascending order.
If there are duplicate dates, only one date is stored in the collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> class with the specified date list.
Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> class.
This constructor is primarily used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> class.
An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> that represents a collection of dates.
Appends the specified <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection.
Use this method to add the specified <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection.
The <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> to add to the collection.
Removes all <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> objects from the collection.

Use this method to remove all <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Count%2A> property to 0.
Returns a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection contains the specified <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> object.
Use this method to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection contains the specified <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object.
The <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> to search for in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Copies the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection to the specified <xref href="System.Array"></xref>, starting with the specified index.

Use this method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index.
The `array` parameter must be a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
A zero-based <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
The first index in the specified <xref href="System.Array"></xref> to receive the items.
Gets the number of <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection.
Use this property to determine the number of dates in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Count%2A> property is often used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound.
The number of <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.

Returns an <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref>-implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> objects within the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection.

Use this method to create an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that can be easily iterated through to get each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection.
Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection.
Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item in the collection.
Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator back to the initial position.

The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method needs to be called after creating an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object or using the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection.
Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.

An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref>-implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> objects within the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection is read-only.
This property always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection can be written to in all cases.
`false` in all cases.
Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection is synchronized (thread safe).
This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> and is overridden to always return `false`.

For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
`false` in all cases.
Gets a <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection.

Use this indexer to get an individual <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection at the specified index using simple array notation.
An ordinal index value that specifies which <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> to return.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that represents an element in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection.
Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection.
The <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
Adds the specified range of dates to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection.
Use this method to add the specified range of dates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that specifies the initial date to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that specifies the end date to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
Gets the object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection.
The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> object itself.

For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
